Reviews.Content: 3 star hotel wouldnt 1 star fine backpackers except outrageous price eur €75 night eur €20 saying clean hot water bed ok overhead fan squeaked couldnt hand held shower whilst standing bath shutters holes fairly light near busy road noisy free parking guests didnt breakfast
